data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The weather is nice today, and lots of people are in the park. Two ____ are ____ a ____ on ____ grass. A ____ is ____ a ____ under ____ trees. Some ____ are ____ a ____ of ____. All the people are enjoying the summer sun.
data.partBlankContent: The weather is nice today, and lots of people are in the park. Two bo__ are kic____ a ba__ on t__ grass. A fam___ is hav___ a pic___ under t__ trees. Some fri____ are star____ a ga__ of base____. All the people are enjoying the summer sun.
data.fullContent: The weather is nice today, and lots of people are in the park. Two boys are kicking a ball on the grass. A family is having a picnic under the trees. Some friends are starting a game of baseball. All the people are enjoying the summer sun.
data.answer: 今天天气很好，公园里有很多人。两个男孩在草地上踢球。一家人正在树下野餐。一些朋友正在开始一场棒球比赛。所有的人都在享受夏天的阳光。
